channel.title: The chuck norris thread!
channel.description:
hi guys,
now before we start posting i must remind you -
[center]you are posting these jokes / images at your own free will and in any cases of chuck norris attacks i am in no way responsible. A roundhouse kick to the head has been known to be fatal from gods i mean chuck's foot so please be aware
Chuck doesn't know about us yet but im sure his godly hearing will detect you typing about him, its only a matter of time :eek: [/center]
I'm also thinking of making a page to his dedication...thoughts?
lets begin with my favorites :)
Chuck Norris doesn't read books. He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.
Chuck Norris only masturbates to pictures of Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris appeared in the "Street Fighter II" video game, but was removed by Beta Testers because every button caused him to do a roundhouse kick. When asked bout this "glitch," Norris replied, "That's no glitch."
Filming on location for Walker: Texas Ranger, Chuck Norris brought a stillborn baby lamb back to life by giving it a prolonged beard rub. Shortly after the farm animal sprang back to life and a crowd had gathered, Chuck Norris roundhouse kicked the animal, breaking its neck, to remind the crew once more that Chuck giveth, and the good Chuck, he taketh away.
please post yours :)
[IMG]http://www.ideagrove.com/blog/uploaded_images/ChuckNorris2-793901.jpg[/img][IMG]http://static.flickr.com/29/66851552_527d04aa59_m.jpg[/img]
why not? [IMG]http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/6540/lol8np.jpg[/img]

lol i have this shirt that has chucks face on it and it says “i dont need a weapon, i am one”. i always get comments and laughs about it

item.title: The chuck norris thread!
item.dc:creator: @Mmmk Mmmk
item.description:
@Mmmk wrote:

sds[0]=" Jack was nimble, Jack was quick, but Jack still couldnt dodge Chuck Norris roundhouse kick.";
sds[1]=" Superman owns a pair of Chuck Norris pajamas.";
sds[2]=" Chuck Norris calendar goes straight from March 31st to April 2nd; no one fools Chuck Norris.";
sds[3]=" Chuck Norris tears cure cancer. Too bad he has never cried.";
sds[4]=" Chuck Norris counted to infinity - twice.";
sds[5]=" It is impossible to be raped by Chuck Norris because that would mean you did not want it to happen.";
sds[6]=" The only reason Chuck Norris didn’t win an Oscar for his performance in Sidekicks is because nobody in their right mind would willingly give Chuck Norris a blunt metal object. Thats just suicide.";
sds[8]=" Objects in Chuck Norris rear-view mirror appear at their correct distances";
sds[9]=" Chuck Norris doesnt use pickup lines, he simply says, Now.";
sds[10]=" Chuck Norris has only one hand: the upper hand.";
sds[11]=" Chuck Norris once visited the Virgin Islands. They are now The Islands.";
sds[12]=" Chuck Norris once had an erection while lying face down. He struck oil.";
sds[13]=" Chuck Norris is currently suing NBC, claiming Law and Order are trademarked names for his left and right legs.";
sds[14]=" Whenever someone is constipated, doctors send them to Chuck Norris so he can scare the shit out of them.";
sds[15]=" Chuck Norris can slam revolving doors.";
sds[16]=" Chuck Norris does not hunt because the word hunting implies the possibility of failure. Chuck Norris goes killing.";
sds[17]=" Chuck Norris does not sleep. He waits.";
sds[18]=" Chuck Norris is the reason for Attention Deficit Disorder. There is no way anyone can pay attention when they know Chuck Norris is lurking.";
sds[19]=" Chuck Norris can speak braille.";
sds[20]=" The quickest way to a mans heart is with Chuck Norris’s fist.";
sds[21]=" If you lost your virginity, Chuck Norris probably has it.";
sds[22]=" Chuck Norris is not hung like a horse… horses are hung like Chuck Norris";
sds[23]=" Rosa Parks refused to get out of her seat because she was saving it for Chuck Norris.";
sds[24]=" The chief export of Chuck Norris is pain.";
sds[25]=" Chuck Norris owns the greatest Poker Face of all-time. It helped him win the 1983 World Series of Poker despite him holding just a Joker, a Get out of Jail Free Monopoly card, a 2 of clubs, 7 of spades and a green #4 card from the game Uno.";
sds[26]=" Chuck Norris puts the laughter in manslaughter.";
sds[28]=" Chuck Norris doesn’t read books. He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.";
sds[30]=" Chuck Norris did that to Michael Jacksons face.";
sds[31]=" Leading hand sanitizers claim they can kill 99.9 percent of germs. Chuck Norris can kill 100 percent of whatever the hell he wants.";
sds[32]=" Chuck Norris was originally cast as the main character in 24, but was replaced by the producers when he managed to kill every terrorist and save the day in 12 minutes and 37 seconds.";
sds[33]=" To prove it isnt that big of a deal to beat cancer. Chuck Norris smoked 15 cartons of cigarettes a day for 2 years and aquired 7 different kinds of cancer only to rid them from his body by flexing for 30 minutes. Beat that, Lance Armstrong.";
sds[34]=" Chuck Norris cowboy boots are made from real cowboys.";
sds[35]=" Ghosts are actually caused by Chuck Norris killing people faster than Death can process them.";
sds[36]=" Chuck Norris has to maintain a concealed weapon license in all 50 states in order to legally wear pants.";
sds[37]=" If you stare directly into the sun it will bring some eye problems. If you stare directly into Chuck Norris it will bring death.";
sds[38]=" Jawbreakers were originally in the shape of Chuck Norris fist.";
sds[39]=" Chuck Norris sold his soul to the devil for his rugged good looks and unparalleled martial arts ability. Shortly after the transaction was finalized, Chuck roundhouse kicked the devil in the face and took his soul back. The devil, who appreciates irony, couldnt stay mad and admitted he should have seen it coming. They now play poker every second Wednesday of the month.";
sds[40]=" Chuck Norris sleeps with a night light. Not because Chuck Norris is afraid of the dark, but the dark is afraid of Chuck Norris";
sds[41]=" Chuck Norris got in touch with his feminine side, and promptly got her pregnant.";
sds[42]=" Chuck Norris is allowed to talk about Fight Club.";
sds[43]=" Chuck Norris died ten years ago, but the Grim Reaper cant get up the courage to tell him.";
sds[44]=" When Chuck Norris answers the phone, he just says Go. This is not permission for you to begin speaking, it is your cue to start running for your life.";
sds[45]=" We all know the magic word is please. As in the sentence, Please dont kill me. Too bad Chuck Norris doesn’t believe in magic.";
sds[46]=" When Chuck Norris gives you the finger, hes telling you how many seconds you have left to live.";
sds[47]=" Little kids enjoy lighting ants on fire with magnifying glasses. Chuck Norris enjoys lighting little kids on fire with ants. Scientists have yet to find out how this feat is achieved.";
sds[48]=" As a child, Chuck Norris played Hungry Hungry Hippos with real hippos.";
sds[49]=" When Chuck Norris exercises, the machine gets stronger.";
sds[50]=" Chuck Norris only uses one chopstick.";
sds[51]=" When the Boogeyman goes to sleep every night he checks his closet for Chuck Norris.";
sds[52]=" Chuck Norris always has the right of way.";
sds[53]=" 28 7.179 We all know the magic word is please. As in the sentence, Please don’t kill me. Too bad Chuck Norris doesn’t believe in magic.";
sds[54]=" When Chuck Norris gets in a car crash the air bags do not save Chuck Norris, they save the car.";
sds[55]=" The saddest moment for a child is not when he learns Santa Claus isn’t real, it’s when he learns Chuck Norris is.";
sds[56]=" If it looks like chicken, tastes like chicken, and feels like chicken but Chuck Norris says its beef, then it’s fucking beef.";
sds[57]=" When Chuck Norris sends in his taxes, he sends blank forms and includes only a picture of himself, crouched and ready to attack. Chuck Norris has not had to pay taxes ever.";
sds[58]=" Chuck Norris once killed a bird by throwing it off a cliff.";
sds[59]=" Chuck Norris can divide by zero.";
sds[60]=" Chuck Norris always gets blackjack. Even when he’s playing poker.";
sds[61]=" Chuck Norris was once the F.B.I’s chief negotiator. His job involved calling up criminals and saying, This is Chuck Norris.";
sds[62]=" The phrase ,Made by Chuck Norris, is imprinted beneath the surface of China.";
sds[63]=" Chuck Norris frequently donates blood to the Red Cross. Just never his own.";
sds[64]=" Chuck Norris crossed the road. Nobody has ever dared question his motives.";
sds[65]=" Ozzy Osbourne once bit the head off a bat. Not to be outdone, Chuck Norris then bit the head off Batman.";
sds[66]=" One time in an airport a guy accidentally called Chuck Norris Chick Norris. He explained it was an honest mistake and apologized profusely. Chuck accepted his apology and politely signed an autograph. Nine months later, the guy’s wife gave birth to a bearded baby. The guy knew exactly what had happened, and blames nobody but himself.";
sds[67]=" When driving in his SUV, Chuck Norris always swerves out of the way if a squirrel is in the road. Not because he finds their antics amusing, but because it gives him a chance to run over pedestrians.";
sds[68]=" Chuck Norris doesn’t tea-bag, he potato-sacks.";
sds[69]=" Chuck Norris can create a rock so heavy that even he can’t lift it. And then he lifts it anyways, just to show you who the hell Chuck Norris is.";
sds[70]=" Someone once tried to tell Chuck Norris that roundhouse kicks aren’t the best way to kick someone. This has been recorded by historians as the worst mistake anyone has ever made.";
sds[71]=" Chuck Norris once caught the common cold, then broke it’s neck.";
sds[72]=" For the sake of convenience, the Grim Reaper is Chuck Norris’ receptionist.";
sds[73]=" 25 6.800 The most effective form of suicide known to man is to type Chuck Norris into Google and hit I’m Feeling Lucky!.";
sds[74]=" Chuck Norris was sending an email one day, when he realized that it would be faster to run.";
sds[75]=" Jeeves asks Chuck Norris.";
sds[76]=" If at first you don’t succeed, you are obviously not Chuck Norris.";
sds[77]=" Chuck Norris can walk, talk, chew gum, pat his head, rub his belly and can still kill you quietly and unnoticed on a busy street corner.";
sds[78]=" If you see Chuck Norris crying he will grant you a wish, if your wish is dying.";
sds[79]=" Water boils faster when Chuck Norris watches it.";
sds[80]=" The only reason the Energizer Bunny keeps going and going is because it knows Chuck Norris is after it.";
sds[81]=" In order to survive a nuclear attack, you must remember to stop, drop, and be Chuck Norris.";
sds[82]=" It’s said that if you look directly into Chuck Norris’ eyes you can see the beginning and end of all things… but no one has had the balls to try.";
sds[83]=" Chuck Norris believes that it’s not butter.";
sds[84]=" As a young boy Chuck Norris molested 426 catholic priests.";
sds[85]=" Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know when Chuck Norris is going to kill you.";
sds[86]=" On the first day, Chuck Norris said, Let there be beard. And it was awesome.";
sds[87]=" Chuck Norris doesn’t get paper cuts, paper gets Chuck Norris cuts.";
sds[88]=" Due to the tenacity of his saliva, it only takes Chuck Norris 1/2 a lick to get to the Tootsie Roll center of a Tootsie Pop.";
sds[89]=" When the Incredible Hulk gets angry he transforms into Chuck Norris.";
sds[90]=" Chuck Norris can kill you in seven different languages.";
sds[91]=" Chuck Norris once had a near death experience. Needless to say, Death now refuses to come near him.";
sds[92]=" Chuck Norris doesnâ€™t wear a watch, HE decides what time it is.";
sds[93]=" Chuck Norris gave Mona Lisa that smile.";
sds[94]=" When Chuck Norris does a pushup, he isnâ€™t lifting himself up, heâ€™s pushing the Earth down.";
sds[95]=" Chuck Norris is the reason why Waldo is hiding.";
sds[96]=" There is no theory of evolution. Just a list of creatures Chuck Norris has allowed to live.";
sds[97]=" Outer space exists because it’s afraid to be on the same planet with Chuck Norris.";
sds[98]=" Rather than being birthed like a normal child, Chuck Norris instead decided to punch his way out of his motherâ€™s womb.";
sds[99]=" Chuck Norris is the only man to ever defeat a brick wall in a game of tennis.";
sds[100]=" Chuck Norris has two speeds. Walk, and Kill.";

Read full topic

I’m sure CheeseHunk will take a look here.
[/quote]

Ugghhh, do you think i should tell them the story?
I said it was a secret to only the forum members of SRL, but I like this place to, think I should tell them?

Miss Silabsoft, I am dissapointed in you, your just jealous of Chuck Norris.[/quote]

Just luck, that’s all.

Still, very cleaver.

item.title: The chuck norris thread!
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

hi guys,

          now before we start posting i must remind you -

[center]you are posting these jokes / images at your own free will and in any cases of chuck norris attacks i am in no way responsible. A roundhouse kick to the head has been known to be fatal from gods i mean chuck’s foot so please be aware

Chuck doesn’t know about us yet but im sure his godly hearing will detect you typing about him, its only a matter of time :eek: [/center]

I’m also thinking of making a page to his dedication…thoughts?

lets begin with my favorites

Chuck Norris doesn’t read books. He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.

Chuck Norris only masturbates to pictures of Chuck Norris.

Chuck Norris appeared in the “Street Fighter II” video game, but was removed by Beta Testers because every button caused him to do a roundhouse kick. When asked bout this “glitch,” Norris replied, “That’s no glitch.”

Filming on location for Walker: Texas Ranger, Chuck Norris brought a stillborn baby lamb back to life by giving it a prolonged beard rub. Shortly after the farm animal sprang back to life and a crowd had gathered, Chuck Norris roundhouse kicked the animal, breaking its neck, to remind the crew once more that Chuck giveth, and the good Chuck, he taketh away.

please post yours

why not?
